resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157295</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157295</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1907</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Inventions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfindungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Inventions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Invenções</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Invenzioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφευρέσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Invenciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for English students, where the student learns all about a number of scientific Inventions, answers questions on the subject and then write about an invention that they felt infuenced the world</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inventions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">science.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für englische 
Kursteilnehmer, in denen der Kursteilnehmer alle über eine Anzahl von
wissenschaftlichen Erfindungen erlernt, Antwortfragen über das Thema 
und schreiben dann über eine Erfindung, daß sie infuenced die Welt 
glaubten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais, où l'étudiant apprend tous au sujet d'un certain
nombre d'inventions scientifiques, des questions de réponses sur le 
sujet et écrivent alors au sujet d'une invention qu'elles se sont 
senties infuenced le monde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses, onde o estudante aprende tudo sobre um número de
invenções científicas, perguntas das respostas no assunto e escreve
então sobre uma invenção que sentiu infuenced o mundo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli allievi
inglesi, in cui l'allievo impara tutti circa un certo numero di 
invenzioni scientifiche, domande di risposte sull'oggetto ed allora 
scrive circa un'invenzione che hanno ritenuto infuenced il mondo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές, όπου ο σπουδαστής μαθαίνει όλους για 
διάφορες επιστημονικές εφευρέσεις, απαντά στις ερωτήσεις στο 
θέμα και γράφει έπειτα για μια εφεύρεση ότι αισθάνθηκαν ότι ο 
κόσμος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses, donde el estudiante aprende todos sobre un 
número de invenciones científicas, las preguntas de las respuestas 
sobre el tema y entonces escribe sobre una invención que se sentían 
infuenced el mundo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfindungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inventions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la science.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">invenções</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciência.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">invenzioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienza.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εφευρέσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιστήμη.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">invenciones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciencia.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
